title: The Cask of Amontillado
description: C&C Web Press brings you from our short story series, The Cask of Amontillado by classic Romantic/Gothic author Edgar Allan Poe. Poe is considered by many to be the father of the Romantic Gothic Literary movement and he wrote over 70 short stories, all of which are more popular today than when he originally wrote them.
author: Edgar Allan Poe
